com.taidoc.pclinklibrary.connection

Class AbstractConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.taidoc.pclinklibrary.connection.AbstractConnection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AndroidBluetoothConnection, PL2303Connection

    public abstract class AbstractConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Abstract connection class, all implementation must inheritance it.

    Author:
    Jay Lee

      • sendAndReceive

        public int[] sendAndReceive(int[] txCmd)
        Send TaiDoc bus tx command and receive TaiDoc bus rx command.
        Note：send command array length equal receive command array length

        Parameters:
        txCmd - TaiDoc bus tx command array
        Returns:
        TaiDoc bus rx command array
        Throws:
        {@link - ExceedRetryTimesException}

      • sendAndReceive

        public int[] sendAndReceive(int[] txCmd,
                   int rxCmdLength)
        Send TaiDoc bus tx command and receive TaiDoc bus rx command.You can control receive command array length here

        Parameters:
        txCmd - TaiDoc bus tx command array
        rxCmdLength - Receive TaiDoc bus rx command array length
        Returns:
        TaiDoc bus rx command array
        Throws:
        {@link - ExceedRetryTimesException}

        Returns:

        Throws:
